info.author: Taylor J. Meek, CloudBolt Software
info.description:
zendeskclient
=============

A lightweight ZenDesk REST API client written in Python.

Usage
=====

    from zendeskclient import ZenDeskClient
    client = ZenDeskClient('bob.smith@acme.com', 'acme-software.zendesk.com', password='hunter2')
    all_tickets = client.core.tickets.get()

info.name: zendeskclient
info.html_description:
zendeskclient

A lightweight ZenDesk REST API client written in Python.

Usage

from zendeskclient import ZenDeskClient client = ZenDeskClient(‘bob.smith@acme.com’, ‘acme-software.zendesk.com’, password=’hunter2’) all_tickets = client.core.tickets.get()
